0.text: Hello, nice to see you! If you want, I can be your personal guide around the state. I'll show you the most interesting places in our wonderful state, tell you what you can do, and give you tips for enjoying life! Would you like that?

1.text:
I think we should go to the town hall first. I've already put a marker on your map ;)

You can get a job in the city hall, and next to it constantly hangs around a lot of onlookers. Be careful: not all people are friendly, sometimes you can meet unpleasant and toxic personalities! If someone bothers you - just write (T) /pmute and its ID, life immediately becomes better!

All right, run, my friend.

2.text:
Your first task is to get some money, don't ask why, you just know you'll need it!

Decide where you're going ... it could be: Farm, mine, sawmill or port, my friends will be there to explain everything to you.
